Title: Love Me Not?
Writer: Vasilis Alexakis, Sotiris Kakisis, Giorgos Panousopoulos
Actors: Andreas Barkoulis, Betty Livanou, Myrto Parashi, Antonis Theodorakopoulos
Plot: The bitter-sweet story, told in flashbacks,of a man over fifty who spent his lifetime fascinated by women and the sexual power they exerted on him. This film celebrates eroticism. It ...
